'''''Voice of Akasha''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain an [[Akasha Terminal]] during Step 1 of the Archon Quest [[The Trail of the God of Wisdom]].
